alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 10:19PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN WEST FELICIANA, NORTH CENTRAL WEST BATON ROUGE, SOUTHEASTERN POINTE COUPEE, EAST FELICIANA AND NORTHWESTERN EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 1045 PM CST... At 1019 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of New Roads, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zachary, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Slaughter, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman, and Felps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
